Definition at line 8 of file software_comment.php.

Member Function Documentation

SoftwareComment::permalink ( $  relative = TRUE  ) 

Provides a unique permalink URL for the receiver object.

Subclassers that wish to provide custom permalinks for objects should not override this method. Override the relative_url method instead.

Parameters:
relative TRUE if the permalink should not contain the protocol and domain part of the URL, FALSE if you want them.

Reimplemented from ActiveRecord.
